segments.text: I would like to check in . Here are my ticket and baggage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , sir . Your baggage is 2kg overweight.You have to pay extra money for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , can I put something in this handbag ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Now it's all right . Here is your boarding pass and label . Have a nice trip .
segments.speaker: S1
